params._virtualPowerPlantAddress: address of parent contract deploying this contract

checkBatteryEnergy().notice: check each battery's energy level and charge/discharge based oncurrent energy rate and battery's price threshold

executeBatteryTransaction(uint256).notice: for each battery execute the battery transaction by making decisionon charging/discharging
